participant_1.background:
I go fishing with my uncle and reminisce about the old days.
i have a condition that prevents me from going to high altitudes.
i am a senior citizen.
I have always enjoyed the company of animals in fantasy fiction books, but I do not have any pets of my own.
I'm not very active on social media, but I like sharing pictures of my walks with my friends and family.

participant_2.background:
My family is supportive and understanding, even though they don't know about my love life.
i have 4 dogs.
I'm not really one for relationships, but my dog has been with me for 10 years.
I enjoy listening to the blues while wearing my hunter green suit.
I enjoy the creativity of Halloween and the joy of weddings.

content.text: It is going well! I am going to a wedding later today.
Oh that sounds fun! Do you know the couple well?
Not really, but my friend is a bridesmaid.
Oh well, I am sure it will be a fun time!
Thanks! I am hoping I can meet some new people.
I bet you will! I love going to weddings.
Me too! I love the creativity of it all.
Me too! And the joy of the couple.
Yes! I love seeing love in action.
I agree! It is always so inspiring.
It is! I am so happy for them.
Me too! I hope they have a wonderful life together.
Thanks! I am sure they will.
